title: Recovering the Sacred, Part 3- Grieving the death of God w/ Jordan Hall
description:
Jordan and I gather together into dia logos the recovering of the sacred from part one and the relationship between the sacred and grief from part 2 to explore the proposal that perhaps the West needs to grieve the death of God more properly before moving on to a new relationship with the sacred. 

Jordan's channel:  https://www.youtube.com/user/jordangreenhall
